description.zh-cn: 1947年6月由晋冀鲁豫野战军发起的战役，是中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战中由战略防御转入战略进攻的开端。
description.en: A campaign launched in June 1947 by the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army, marking the beginning of the People's Liberation Army's shift from strategic defense to strategic offense in the second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，由刘伯承任司令员，邓小平任政治委员。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the second Chinese Civil War, commanded by Liu Bocheng with Deng Xiaoping as the political commissar.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创始人和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅，时任晋冀鲁豫野战军司令员。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China, and the commander of the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，时任晋冀鲁豫野战军政治委员。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, and the political commissar of the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一，由陈毅任司令员兼政治委员，粟裕任副司令员。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the second Chinese Civil War, with Chen Yi as commander and political commissar, and Su Yu as deputy commander.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第七十四军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第七十四军
国民革命军整编第七十四师

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的精锐部队之一，在孟良崮战役中被华东野战军全歼。
description.en: One of the elite units of the National Revolutionary Army, which was completely annihilated by the East China Field Army in the Menglianggu Campaign.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1947年国民革命军对中国共产党控制的陕北和山东解放区发动的军事进攻战略。
description.en: A military offensive strategy launched by the National Revolutionary Army in 1947 against the liberated areas of Northern Shaanxi and Shandong controlled by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 鲁西南战役胜利后，刘邓大军挺进中原的战略性进攻行动。
description.en: A strategic offensive operation by the Liu-Deng Army advancing into the Central Plains after the victory of the Southwestern Shandong Campaign.

nodes.id: 国民革命军整编第五十五师

zh-cn: 国民革命军整编第五十五师

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间国民革命军的部队，在鲁西南战役中被晋冀鲁豫野战军歼灭。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army during the second Chinese Civil War, annihilated by the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army in the Southwestern Shandong Campaign.

nodes.id: 国民革命军整编第六十八师

zh-cn: 国民革命军整编第六十八师

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间国民革命军的部队，在鲁西南战役中被晋冀鲁豫野战军歼灭。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army during the second Chinese Civil War, annihilated by the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army in the Southwestern Shandong Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，时任整编第五十五师师长，在郓城战斗中化装逃脱。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the commander of the Reorganized 55th Division at the time. He escaped in disguise during the Battle of Yuncheng.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，时任整编第六十六师师长，在羊山集战斗中被俘。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the commander of the Reorganized 66th Division at the time. He was captured in the Battle of Yangshanji.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，时任整编第七十师师长，在六营集战斗中被俘。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the commander of the Reorganized 70th Division at the time. He was captured in the Battle of Liuyingji.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，时任整编第五十五师副师长，在郓城战斗中被俘。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the deputy commander of the Reorganized 55th Division at the time. He was captured in the Battle of Yuncheng.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，鲁西南战役时任国民党军增援兵团司令，战后被撤职。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, who served as the commander of the KMT reinforcement corps during the Southwestern Shandong Campaign and was dismissed after the battle.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，鲁西南战役后被撤职查办。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, who was dismissed and investigated after the Southwestern Shandong Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军高级将领，时任陆军总司令，负责指挥中原战场。
description.en: A high-ranking general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the Commander-in-Chief of the Army at the time and responsible for commanding the Central Plains theater.

description.zh-cn: 晋冀鲁豫野战军战斗英雄，在定陶攻坚战中牺牲。
description.en: A combat hero of the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army who was killed in the battle for Dingtao.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，时任整编第三十二师师长。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, serving as the commander of the Reorganized 32nd Division at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，时任晋冀鲁豫野战军第二纵队司令员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, serving as the commander of the Second Column of the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，时任晋冀鲁豫野战军第三纵队司令员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, serving as the commander of the Third Column of the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army at the time.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第六十六军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第六十六军

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的精锐部队之一，属陈诚土木系，在鲁西南战役羊山集战斗中被全歼。
description.en: One of the elite units of the National Revolutionary Army, part of Chen Cheng's Civil Engineering Clique, which was annihilated in the Battle of Yangshanji during the Southwestern Shandong Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间国民革命军的部队，在鲁西南战役六营集战斗中被全歼。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army during the second Chinese Civil War, annihilated in the Battle of Liuyingji during the Southwestern Shandong Campaign.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第三十二军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第三十二军

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间国民革命军的部队，在鲁西南战役中一部被歼。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army during the second Chinese Civil War, partially annihilated in the Southwestern Shandong Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 晋冀鲁豫野战军（刘邓大军）于1947年6月30日发起鲁西南战役。
description.en: The Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army (Liu-Deng Army) launched the Southwestern Shandong Campaign on June 30, 1947.

description.zh-cn: 鲁西南战役的胜利，标志着中国人民解放军由战略防御转入战略进攻，改变了国共内战的战略态势。
description.en: The victory in the Southwestern Shandong Campaign marked the PLA's transition from strategic defense to strategic offense, changing the strategic situation of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 鲁西南战役的胜利为刘邓大军挺进中原，实施“千里跃进大别山”的战略行动打开了突破口。
description.en: The victory of the Southwestern Shandong Campaign opened a breakthrough for the Liu-Deng Army to advance into the Central Plains and implement the strategic action of 'a thousand-li leap to the Dabie Mountains'.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第七十四军

description.zh-cn: 在孟良崮战役中，华东野战军全歼国民革命军整编第七十四师。
description.en: During the Menglianggu Campaign, the East China Field Army completely annihilated the National Revolutionary Army's Reorganized 74th Division.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 孟良崮战役的胜利，使中共中央军委认为战略反攻时机已到，从而筹划了鲁西南战役及后续的千里跃进大别山行动。
description.en: The victory of the Menglianggu Campaign led the CCP Central Military Commission to believe that the time for a strategic counter-offensive had come, thus planning the Southwestern Shandong Campaign and the subsequent 'thousand-li leap to the Dabie Mountains' operation.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石制定并推行了对中共山东和陕北解放区的“重点进攻”战略。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek formulated and implemented the 'keypoint offense' strategy against the CCP's liberated areas in Shandong and Northern Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 鲁西南战役的胜利从根本上打乱了国军的重点进攻战略部署，粉碎了其计划。
description.en: The victory in the Southwestern Shandong Campaign fundamentally disrupted the strategic deployment of the Nationalist army's 'keypoint offense' and shattered its plan.

relationships.target: 国民革命军整编第五十五师

description.zh-cn: 在鲁西南战役第一阶段的郓城战斗中，晋冀鲁豫野战军歼灭国民革命军整编第五十五师师部及两个旅。
description.en: In the Battle of Yuncheng during the first phase of the Southwestern Shandong Campaign, the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army annihilated the headquarters and two brigades of the National Revolutionary Army's Reorganized 55th Division.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁西南战役第二阶段的六营集战斗中，晋冀鲁豫野战军全歼国民革命军整编第七十师。
description.en: In the Battle of Liuyingji during the second phase of the Southwestern Shandong Campaign, the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army completely annihilated the National Revolutionary Army's Reorganized 70th Division.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第六十六军

description.zh-cn: 在鲁西南战役第三阶段的羊山集战斗中，晋冀鲁豫野战军全歼国民革命军精锐部队整编第六十六师。
description.en: In the Battle of Yangshanji during the third phase of the Southwestern Shandong Campaign, the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army completely annihilated the elite National Revolutionary Army's Reorganized 66th Division.

description.zh-cn: 顾祝同指派王敬久担任增援鲁西南的国民党军兵团司令。
description.en: Gu Zhutong appointed Wang Jingjiu as the commander of the KMT army corps to reinforce Southwestern Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 王敬久作为前线兵团司令，接受陆军总司令顾祝同的指挥。
description.en: As the frontline corps commander, Wang Jingjiu was under the command of the Army Commander-in-Chief, Gu Zhutong.

relationships.target: 国民革命军整编第五十五师
国民革命军第六十六军
国民革命军第三十二军

description.zh-cn: 晋冀鲁豫野战军战斗英雄王克勤在鲁西南战役的定陶攻坚战中牺牲。
description.en: Wang Keqin, a combat hero of the Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Field Army, was killed during the assault on Dingtao in the Southwestern Shandong Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 鲁西南战役失败后，国民党军兵团司令王敬久被撤职查办。
description.en: After the defeat in the Southwestern Shandong Campaign, KMT corps commander Wang Jingjiu was dismissed and investigated.

description.zh-cn: 鲁西南战役后，国民党军将领王仲廉被撤职查办。
description.en: After the Southwestern Shandong Campaign, KMT general Wang Zhonglian was dismissed and investigated.

description.zh-cn: 在羊山集战斗的关键时刻，刘伯承当面命令纵队司令员陈再道调整部署，坚决歼敌。
description.en: At a critical moment in the Battle of Yangshanji, Liu Bocheng personally ordered column commander Chen Zaidao to adjust deployments and resolutely annihilate the enemy.

description.zh-cn: 在羊山集战斗的关键时刻，刘伯承当面命令纵队司令员陈锡联调整部署，坚决歼敌。
description.en: At a critical moment in the Battle of Yangshanji, Liu Bocheng personally ordered column commander Chen Xilian to adjust deployments and resolutely annihilate the enemy.
